title: Golden Mushroom

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: The upper text explains the mechanic.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:
fields.value: clocks:1171222463200379021> + <:blue:1106234079055200378> + <:green:1106234108042031166> + <:gray:1107516393450127411> + <:brown:1107516362903007232> ): You choose how far the **Clocktower** advances every use of this card between 1 - 3 hours.

desc:
Post 2399
- __Tag: Mario Kart__: This card cannot be played and has its passives disabled unless if this is the most recent-drawn Mario Kart item card.
- This card is **Echo 3**.

- Playing this card blasts you towards the finish line, moving you to in front of the 2 next people in the turn order and negates the effects of a Blue Shell (223) recently played on you. The **Clocktower** advances 2 hours.
 - This card becomes **Ethereal** and is used automatically after its first use.
